message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a fantastic opportunity for you to own this valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1400000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you is $1200000. I'm confident you'll find it a worthwhile investment.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $1350000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate further. After reconsidering, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm now offering the product to you for $1380000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you and the original price I was willing to accept.

I understand your position, Alice. Let me think about it for a moment. In light of our previous discussion, I am prepared to offer $1365000 for the product. I hope this proposal is acceptable and moves us closer to reaching an agreement.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm now offering the product to you for $1390000. This is my final offer, and I hope you can meet me at this price.

Respectfully, Alice, I've carefully considered your last offer and I'm willing to move forward with a counteroffer of $1375000 for the product. I hope this proposal allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
